title: Activate Docker Hub account (GCP)
content:
You need a valid Docker Hub account to download product images from Docker Hub.

Skip this section if you already have an active Docker Hub account.

  1. Create a Docker Hub account at https://hub.docker.com. When you enter your password for your Docker Hub account, don't use single quotes. Make a note of your Docker Hub ID and password. 
  2. Request the software fulfillment and licensing team of your region to activate your Docker Hub account. Send emails to one of these contacts (Americas: mfi-dockersupportams@opentext.com, Asia-Pacific: mfi-dockersupportapj@opentext.com, and Europe, Middle East, and Africa: mfi-dockersupportemea@opentext.com) according to your region with the following information:
    • Company name
    • Customer Service Agreement ID
    • Docker ID
    • Email
    • License edition
    You will receive an email notification authorizing your Docker Hub account to access the product images. This may take one or more business days. Meanwhile, you can proceed and complete the other prerequisite tasks explained in the upcoming pages.
